docs.lead_paragraph: TO THE SENATE AND ASSEMBLY: FELLOW-CITIZENS:--In obedience to the requirements of the Constitution, I hereby submit for your consideration an account of the financial condition of the State, its various institutions and interests, together with such remarks as they suggest, and as seem to me appropriate.

headline.main: NINE DAYS LATER FROM EUROPE,; ARRIVAL OF THE ATLANTIC. NOTHING IMPORTANT FROM SEBASTOPOL. THE QUEEN'S SPEECH. Debates in the Lords and Commons. Lord John Russell on the Austrian Treaty. LATER FROM CHINA. Markets--Cotton Lower--Grain Firm--Consols 92 ex-Dividend.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States Mail steamer Atlantic, Capt. WEST, arrived at this port on Sunday evening, from Liverpool, Monday, A. M., Dec. 18, having returned to port soon after her first clearance on Saturday the 16th, to repair a broken rudder. The screw steamer Canadian, from Portland, Me., arrived at Liverpool on Thursday, the 14th.

The screw steamer Canadian, from Portland, Me., arrived at Liverpool on Thursday, the 14th.
